name: 6N23
description:
6n23 is an action-platformer-racing game where you rush as fast as you can using your finger to find the path. With controls similar to a fighting game, it allows you to practice your control skills.

In 6n23, you control a character who is running through a series of levels. The goal is to reach the end of each level as quickly as possible. To do this, you must use your finger to trace the path that the character should take. The path is not always obvious, so you must use your quick reflexes and sharp thinking to find it.
